named-query.name: ObterFilmesComNotaMaiorQue
named-query.query: select distinct f from Filme f join fetch f.atores where f.nota >= :nota

named-query.name: ObterFilmesComNotaMenorQue
named-query.query: select distinct f from Filme f join fetch f.atores where f.nota >= :nota

named-native-query.name: ObterMediaGeralDosFilmes
named-native-query.query: select avg(nota) as media from wm.filmes
